backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining products, categories, orders, user profiles, access control, and menu seeding with admin/user authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and light/dark mode tokens for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app with metadata and Open Graph tags.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React router configuration with layout, menu redirect, main pages, and admin-protected routes.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context providing cart state with localStorage persistence and item/quantity management.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user lacks admin access, offering login and navigation options.
Route guard that checks identity and admin status, showing loading skeleton or denial screen when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name. Handles form submission, validation, and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/brand/PremiumTag: Displays the brand tagline from cafe37 content as muted text.
frontend/src/components/catalog/CatalogO: Shows an alert explaining that orders must be placed via partner platforms and provides buttons linking to Zomato, WhatsApp, and phone.
frontend/src/components/home/HomePromoCa: Homepage carousel with autoplay, hover pause, and fallback UI for failed images, cycling through promo slides.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying cafe info, quick links, contact details, rating summary, and social sharing actions.
frontend/src/components/nav/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with navigation links, branding, login button, mobile menu, and optional admin link.
frontend/src/components/ordering/OnlineO: Component showing Zomato, WhatsApp, and phone ordering options, with compact and full variants.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrderViaC: Dialog-triggering CTA button letting users order an item via WhatsApp or phone.
frontend/src/components/products/Categor: Renders category filter buttons allowing users to select or clear a product category.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Product card showing image, details, availability, price, and contact-based ordering CTA.
frontend/src/components/reviews/GoogleRa: Displays Google rating info in multiple visual variants, using fetched rating data with fallbacks and optional external link.
frontend/src/components/states/ErrorStat: Renders an error alert with title, message, and optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/states/LoadingSk: Provides skeleton loaders for product cards, grids, and tables.
frontend/src/content/cafe37.ts: Exports Cafe 37 business info including hours, contact, links, and highlights.
frontend/src/content/homepageSlides.ts: Defines and exports an array of homepage slide objects with images and text.
frontend/src/content/menuCategories.ts: Contains legacy hardcoded menu categories and a helper to map category IDs to display names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for products, categories, menu, and orders.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode tokens, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the caf√©'s About page with sections for story, features, and an image hero using content from cafe37Content.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Category management page with CRUD dialogs, loading/error states, and table display.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing product, category, menu, and order statistics plus navigation cards.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditMenuPa: Displays seeded menu data, allows seeding test menu items, and lets users browse categories and items.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGoogleRevi: Form page for configuring Google Reviews API settings with validation and update handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Displays detailed order info including items, totals, and customer details with loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Lists all orders in a table with loading/error states and links to order detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin page component for listing, creating, editing, and deleting products using query hooks and modal dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays a simple cart/ordering page with external ordering options and a button to browse the menu.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: File is empty and contains no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Identical to CartPage, showing ordering options and a link to the menu.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact info, map embed, quick action buttons, and facility details using cafe37Content and business hours utilities.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero content, ratings, contact buttons, promo carousel, and highlights sourced from cafe37Content.
frontend/src/pages/MenuRedirectPage.tsx: Immediately redirects users to /menu while showing a loading indicator.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays detailed product info with loading/error states and a CTA to order via contact.
frontend/src/pages/TextMenuPage.tsx: Loads product catalog, groups items by category, and renders a scrollable text-based menu with section navigation.
frontend/src/utils/businessHours.ts: Defines weekly business hours and utilities to get today's hours, formatted schedules, and open/closed status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash-based query params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, priorities, and a request to restore the admin dashboard and reconnect it to dynamic menu data.
